XSpiPs Struct Reference

#include <xspips.h>

XSpiPs_StatusHandler StatusHandler
void * StatusRef

Detailed Description

The XSpiPs driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every SPI device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.
